description: The chief medical officers met to discuss the rise in coronavirus cases in Donegal and the north west.
title: Coronavirus: 'Avoid all but necessary travel across NI-Donegal border'
title_page: Coronavirus: 'Avoid all but necessary travel across NI-Donegal border' - BBC News
maintext: Both Dr McBride and Dr Glynn said there would be "close collaboration" between the relevant authorities in the coming days "to address the concerning trend in case numbers on both sides of the border, not alone in Donegal and Derry, but also in other areas along the border."
